snippet: Sheldon Silver, the speaker of the New York Assembly, said on Thursday night that he would ask for a vote on sanctions, including possible expulsion, against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez.
abstract: New York State Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver says he will seek expulsion of Assemblyman Vito J Lopez, once-powerful Brooklyn Democrat, over accusations of sexual harassment by multiple women who worked for Legislature; Silver reverses his position after firestorm of criticism not only of Lopez's behavior towards women, but also of Legislature's handling of matter.

byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and THOMAS KAPLAN

lead_paragraph: Sheldon Silver, the speaker of the New York Assembly, said on Thursday night that he would ask for a vote on sanctions, including possible expulsion, against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez.

headline.seo: Speaker to Seek Expulsion of Assemblyman Over Harassment Scandal
headline.main: Silver to Seek Lopez’s Expulsion From Assembly Over Harassment Claims
headline.print_headline: Silver to Seek Lopez’s Expulsion From Assembly Over Harassment Claims
